GPU.resolution: Check thermal environmental to ensure GPU operates under Shutdown Temperature (UpperFatal threshold) and power cycle the BaseBoard to recover.
Increase system FAN speed
Reset the GPU. If the GPU continues to exhibit the problem, isolate the server for RMA evaluation.
Restart the affected application.
Reset the GPU and restart affected applications.
Cordon the HGX server node for further diagnosis.
Restart application.  If the application continues to trigger the same event, investigate application changes and logs to investigate potential application problem.

Reset the GPU. If the problem affects multiple connections on the upstream PLX, consider GPU tray RMA.
Likely application/software issue. Restart application.  If the application continues to trigger the same event, investigate application changes and logs to investigate potential application problem.
nvflash can be used to restore deafult inforom.  Inforom corruption is generally an indication of a software failure, and should be investigated with NVIDIA.
Restart application.  If the application continues to trigger the same event, investigate application changes and logs to investigate potential application problem.
Restart application.  If the application continues to trigger the same event, investigate application changes and logs to investigate potential application problem.
Review power configuration and status
Power cycle the BaseBoard. If it does not recover the failure, it is permanant damage.
Power cycle the BaseBoard. If the problem persists, isolate the server for RMA evaluation.
No immediate recovery required. Reset the GPU at next service window.
eROT will try to recover AP by a reset/reboot. If there is still a problem, AP FW needs to be re-flashed.
eROT will try to recover AP by a reset/reboot. If there is still a problem, AP FW needs to be re-flashed.
Cordon HGX server from the cluster for RMA evaluation.
Run recovery tools from BMC

NVSwitch.resolution: Power off the BaseBoard within 1 second, the NVSwitch will be held in reset. Check thermal environmental to ensure the NVSwitch operates under UpperFatal threshold and power cycle the BaseBoard to recover.

InletSensor.resolution: Increase the BaseBoard cooling and check thermal environmental to ensure Inlet Temperature reading is under UpperCritical threshold.
